name: Video Keno Kingdom Game - Casino Keno
name_original: Video Keno Kingdom Game - Casino Keno
description:
*HOT HOT HOT*

*NEW LEVELS*

See if you have the lucky numbers in this authentic Vegas Style Keno app! Looks and feels like the real thing!

8 different Keno themes to make sure you won't get bored. Compare your scores with other live players. Play now to see if you have what it takes to be the best!

INCLUDES:

 * 8 Casino themes to choose from
* FREE Keno tips
* Autoplay functionality
* Quick Pick - quickly pick your numbers
 * Saves your picks and credits
* Gamecenter Leaderboards
 * UNIVERSAL APP - Optimized for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch!  
* HD Retina Graphics
 * Awesome sounds and casino environments

DOWNLOAD IT ALREADY :P
